details: According to best practice,how should we start implementation of business logic?Create a simple set of logic with very few rules first. Once the initial version is tested and proven to the business teams, more complex and sophisticated rules can be added.
According to Forbes it costs ___ times as much to acquire new customers as it does to keep old ones.5
An adaptive model is displayed on the Adaptive Model Management landing page when __________.A strategy that contains an Adaptive Model component is executed.
BAU means?Business as usual...
The Behavior report enables you to __________.Identify active and inactive predictors.
Decision components are grouped into categories.Which category contains the prioritization component? - Selection - Priority - Business Rules - ArbitrationArbitration
The first step in the Model analysis step is ____________?Score comparison
The hard rules usually determines ............ that the customer is or is not eligible for a particular product
How can Administrators and Supervisors use to inspect performance of the decisioning system in detail?Monitor Adaptive Models Monitor Interaction History Browse Reports
How can a Strategy Designer get access to additional rules to change which are not in the current change request ?Send back the change request
How can you access the customer property Age in a filter expression?Primary.Age
How many access groups can be created using the application overlays wizard? (Choose One)5
How much more does it cost to find a new customer than to keep an old one?5 times as much
If a retention strategy is defined under 'Sales' issue then it can access properties: (Choose Two)As defined at the 'Sales' issue level As defined at the 'All Strategies' level
Improving ____________ is the essence of Next-Best-Action.Customer Experience
In a business sandbox, what can you use the Decision Manager Portal for?Manage revisions of the decision artifacts Change business rules and propositions Run tests and simulations to verify changes

In a simulation configuration, the data flow rule is used to define the: (Choose One) - A Visual Business Director output. - Propositions to be offered. - KPI to be used. - Strategy to be usedStrategy to be used
In Decision Management the definition of a proposition is ____________The proposed course of action
In order to set-up a '1-to-many' data relationship for the customer class, which of the following steps should you take? 1) Create a property of type

on the customer class.
2) Define the class relationships in the Decisioning ->Infrastructure landing page. 
3) Define primary key-foreign key relationships in the database to join the tables.
4) Create a property of type
on the customer class.Create a property of type
on the customer class
In order to use a new strategy in the TopOffers process you update the _______________.interaction rule to point to the new strategy
In our predictive model we reduce the number of histogram bins from 10 to 2 becausethe customer behavior is very similar in each group
In Pega Decisioning how can you compare the performance of two different models? (Choose One)Creating a feedback loop.
In Pega Decisioning to randomly select between two predictive models you use ____________.The Champion Challenger component.
In production, what can you use the Decision Manager Portal for?Monitor effectiveness of decisions Inspect interaction history Manage and inspect the details of the adaptive models

In revision management, what are the responsibilities of the Revision Manager?Setting up new revisions Creating change requests Assign change requests to Strategy Designers Approve/Decline change requests after analysis Create revision package to hand over to an SA

In revision management, what are the responsibilities of the Strategy Designer?Working on change requests by modifying one or more business rules Testing and validating changes Submit changes for approval Request access to additional rules

In revision management, whatare the responsibilities of the System Architect?Giving Revision Managers and Strategy Designers access to business rules To bring revised versions of the business rules into production via revision packages
The Interaction Historycomponent can be used to retrieve history ________.for a specific customer
In the Decisioning Analytics category we can find the Adaptive Model, Predictive Model, and _______ componentsScorecard Model
In the next best action, what is the optimal action?The optimal action is the one that satisfies customer expectations while also meeting business objectives.
In the strategy Sales Account strategy you have used the CLV_Threshold property to ______ ?Establish if a customer is eligible for a proposition.

In Visual Business Director, when comparing the results of simulations source versus a reference data source, the red colur indicates:The KPI value in the reference simulation is higher than the value in the source simulation.
In which Communication Channels would Next-Best-Action Advisor apply?Inbound / real-time intelligent interactions
Next-Best-Action ensures thatthe communications between business and the customer are: (Choose Two)Contextual Timely

The Next-Best-Action strategy ____________.Choose One :can present all available offers can only present top 3 offers always presents all available offers can only present the top offercan present all available offers
In the Decision Manager portal the first step required in a change management process is ____________To create a revision
A PMML compliant predictive model can be configured in a DSM strategy usingThe Predictive Model component.
Predictive Model Markup Language was designed to _______Describe predictive models and data transformations.
The predictor overview report enables you to __________.Inspect the use of predictors across all adaptive models.

The 'Properties mapping' tab in a Data Join component is used to ... (Choose Two)Set value of a property for successfully joined records. Copy property values from the joined component to source component.
Propositions are frequently divided intro four business issues, which?Cross-Sell Upsell Retention Service
A revision activated by the System Architect to all operatorsa can be ____________(Choose one) - Deactivated - Deleted - Rolledback - RevertedRolled back
ROI means?Return of investment...
The Set Property decision component can be found in the ________ category.Enrichment

Simulation results can be written to: (Choose Two) - Database via Class - Customer class - Visual Business Director - Database via SQL - Proposition table- Database via Class - Visual Business Director

Three things need to be done to configure an adaptive model record. Which? (Choose Three) 1) Indicate which customer response values will be used to indicate positive behavior. 2)Indicate which customer properties will be used as predictors. 3) Indicate which customer response values will be used to indicate negative behavior. 4) Indicate the output properties.1,2,3
